title: Ping has doubled in the last two weeks randomly, can't figure out why.
body: My normal ping since the server move has been steadily in the range of 42-52 ms for the last year, but all of a sudden the last week and a half or so my ping has been fluctuated between 79-140 ms randomly, and never going below that range. My internet and router itself are fine (I initially thought that was the issue of course) as I regularly play other games like Destiny and Rocket League with zero lag and my ping tests for my router show no issue. Is there any settings issue with the recent Windows 10 update that could have messed with my LoL specifically? (Shared updates are turned off on my computer so that isn't the issue, even though that is a common one found on reddit).  Thanks for any replies in advance.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having issues maintaining a steady connection to our servers, and could even be suffering packet loss.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going wrong.  The results will also provide a list of steps to help resolve your specific issue.  Hopefully that will get you back in game without further problems!

Thanks so much! After the log reader it recommended adding an exception to my webroot....and that fixed the issue instantly! I remember there being an exception already way back, but the recent W10 update must have reverted the setting. all good now :)
